input.sentences: [male] decided to take [female] on a beer tour | the first stop had pretty tasty wine .
the next stop had a drink that she had always wanted to try .
the third on stop on the tour gave her a choice of 3 different ones .
her favorite was the fourth stop | she liked it a lot .
she did not like the last stop | the drink was too thick .
output.sentences: Alcoholics should not go on the Tasty Wine Tour.
Once they start, they will not be able to stop drinking.
The tour allows you to have any drink of your choice.
By your fourth drink, you should be good to go, but the alcoholics just don't stop.
The favorite drink on tour is a thick beer, that alcoholics cant seem to stop drinking.
